description:

But Sam Altman’s company is fighting back against these accusations with some accusations of its…

title: OpenAI Accuses the New York Times of 'Hacking' ChatGPT

description:

The ad, purchased by a political action committee called Fairshake, is being bankrolled by several prominent names in the world of…

title: YouTube Mysteriously Restores Crypto Billionaires’ Attack Ad Against Katie Porter

description:
A reliable way to keep appendages safe from the ravages of the cold is finally here. This month, the Food and Drug Administration approved the first treatment meant to prevent limb amputation from severe frostbite, Eicos Sciences’ Aurlumyn. Compared to standard care, the intravenous drug was shown to significantly…

Read more...
title: There's Finally a Drug That Can Keep Your Fingers and Toes Safe From Frostbite

description:
You can’t really go too far when it comes to phone security, considering everything of importance we put on these compact devices—from bank account apps to our most intimate conversations—and while lock screen protections can keep most people out, they’re not always enough.

title: How To Lock Any iPhone App Behind Face ID, Touch ID, or a Passcode

description:
I tried to wear the OnePlus Watch 2 for a short weekend workout but couldn’t. The watch is too big for me and too dense. It’s not just me, either; I asked my partner if his wrists would be interested in trying on the smartwatch, and he rejected it after seeing the relatively ginormous 47mm display. “That’s way too big…

title: First Look: The OnePlus Watch 2 Is Too Big for My Tiny Wrists
